metadata.title: CVE-2022-22890 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: There is an Assertion 'arguments_type != SCANNER_ARGUMENTS_PRESENT && arguments_type != SCANNER_ARGUMENTS_PRESENT_NO_REG' failed at /jerry-core/parser/js/js-scanner-util.c in Jerryscript 3.0.0.

criterions.comment: iotjs package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
